post.title: KCPR Pledge Week 2013
post.text: Pledge week begins today and continues until Sunday, May 26! Now is the time to support your favorite San Luis Obispo Area community radio station. Not only will you feel accomplished supporting our operations, you can unique Pledge Week 2013 gear. Pledging can be done conveniently through PayPal this year, so check out all the information on the Pledge page!

post.title: New Website!
post.text: The website has been refreshed again. We want to include all the the information that you want to see. While we are working on implementing more features, we'd love to hear your feedback. Email us at kcpr.internet [at] gmail.com.
